We are recruiting a dedicated and experienced candidate to join our team in the capacity below:

Job Position: HSE Officer

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	The successful candidate will be responsible for developing, implementing, and maintaining our Health, Safety, and Environment (HSE) management system.

Key Responsibilities


	Develop, implement, and maintain the HSE management system, ensuring compliance with relevant regulations and industry standards.
	Conduct regular risk assessments, identifying potential hazards and implementing controls to mitigate risks.
	Develop and deliver HSE training programs for employees, ensuring they are equipped to work safely and efficiently.

	Monitor and report on HSE performance, providing insights and recommendations for improvement.

	Strong knowledge of HSE regulations and industry standards (e.g., OSHA, ISO 45001).
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Operations Manager (QSR)",
  "description": "Uncle Stan&#39;s Foods is a small chops company known for it&#39;s unique finger food taste all over Lagos. Our brand makes us unique.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Operations Manager (QSR)

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos

Job Summary


	The Operations Manager at Uncle Stan&rsquo;s Foods is responsible for overseeing daily operations across all outlets and central kitchen units to ensure optimal efficiency, quality standards, profitability, and customer satisfaction.
	The role ensures that all branches align with the company&rsquo;s operational standards, performance targets, and brand promise.


Key Responsibilities
Outlet &amp; Production Oversight:


	Supervise daily activities across all restaurant outlets and central kitchen.
	Monitor service speed, food quality, hygiene, and customer experience.
	Enforce standard operating procedures (SOPs) and quality assurance processes.
	Conduct regular visits to outlets to evaluate performance and compliance.


Inventory &amp; Supply Chain Management:


	Ensure accurate stock planning, purchasing, and inventory controls across all outlets.
	Oversee procurement and storekeeping activities, ensuring FIFO and cost efficiency.
	Liaise with the procurement and central store to ensure timely replenishment.


Team Management &amp; Leadership:


	Directly supervise outlet managers and central kitchen supervisors.
	Conduct training, coaching, and performance evaluations.
	Foster a culture of discipline, teamwork, and continuous improvement.


Financial &amp; Sales Performance:


	Monitor daily, weekly, and monthly sales against targets for each outlet.
	Analyze operational costs and work with Finance to optimize profitability.
	Recommend cost-cutting or revenue-generating initiatives.


Customer Satisfaction:


	Monitor feedback channels to identify recurring customer issues or trends.
	Implement initiatives that improve service delivery and overall satisfaction.
	Address escalated complaints or operational lapses promptly.


Reporting &amp; Documentation:


	Submit detailed weekly and monthly operations reports.
	Collaborate with the Audit, Accounts, and HR departments to ensure all policies and KPIs are implemented and tracked.
	Document and report incidents, maintenance issues, or disciplinary cases.


Strategic Operations Planning:


	Support business expansion by scouting new locations and setting up new outlets.
	Plan and implement strategies for peak periods, promotions, or holidays.
	Ensure operational alignment with the company&rsquo;s growth objectives.

Operations Manager (QSR) Job at Uncle Stan's Foods




        
    

        
        Uncle Stan's Foods is a small chops company known for it's unique finger food taste all over Lagos. Our brand makes us unique.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Operations Manager (QSR)

Job Location: Lagos

Job Summary
     

            
    




	The Operations Manager at Uncle Stan’s Foods is responsible for overseeing daily operations across all outlets and central kitchen units to ensure optimal efficiency, quality standards, profitability, and customer satisfaction.
	The role ensures that all branches align with the company’s operational standards, performance targets, and brand promise.


Key Responsibilities
Outlet & Production Oversight:


	Supervise daily activities across all restaurant outlets and central kitchen.
	Monitor service speed, food quality, hygiene, and customer experience.
	Enforce standard operating procedures (SOPs) and quality assurance processes.
	Conduct regular visits to outlets to evaluate performance and compliance.


Inventory & Supply Chain Management:


	Ensure accurate stock planning, purchasing, and inventory controls across all outlets.
	Oversee procurement and storekeeping activities, ensuring FIFO and cost efficiency.
	Liaise with the procurement and central store to ensure timely replenishment.


Team Management & Leadership:


	Directly supervise outlet managers and central kitchen supervisors.
	Conduct training, coaching, and performance evaluations.
	Foster a culture of discipline, teamwork, and continuous improvement.


Financial & Sales Performance:


	Monitor daily, weekly, and monthly sales against targets for each outlet.
	Analyze operational costs and work with Finance to optimize profitability.
	Recommend cost-cutting or revenue-generating initiatives.


Customer Satisfaction:


	Monitor feedback channels to identify recurring customer issues or trends.
	Implement initiatives that improve service delivery and overall satisfaction.
	Address escalated complaints or operational lapses promptly.


Reporting & Documentation:


	Submit detailed weekly and monthly operations reports.
	Collaborate with the Audit, Accounts, and HR departments to ensure all policies and KPIs are implemented and tracked.
	Document and report incidents, maintenance issues, or disciplinary cases.


Strategic Operations Planning:


	Support business expansion by scouting new locations and setting up new outlets.
	Plan and implement strategies for peak periods, promotions, or holidays.
	Ensure operational alignment with the company’s growth objectives.


Key Performance Indicators (KPIs)


	Sales targets achievement (daily, weekly, monthly per outlet)
	Outlet performance rating (internal audits, customer reviews)
	Cost control efficiency (food cost %, wastage levels)
	Inventory accuracy and variance levels
	Staff productivity and turnover rate
	Customer satisfaction scores
	Timeliness and quality of reporting


Qualifications


	Bachelor’s Degree in Business Administration, Hospitality, or a related field.
	Minimum of 5 years experience in operations within the QSR or hospitality sector.
	Strong leadership and communication skills.
	Proven ability to manage multi-outlet operations.
	Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite and reporting tools.


Work Conditions:


	Full-time, on-site with regular outlet visitation.
	Availability for weekend and holiday supervision as needed.
	Fast-paced, high-demand environment.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hrunclestansfoods@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
